title: Earthquake and Tsunami near Sendai, Japan
description: A swath of agricultural fields lies between the Japanese city of Sendai and Sendai Bay, and the area was one of the hardest hit by the tsunami on March 11, 2011.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
